name: Kimchi-Style Fried Rice
preparation: In a Round Steamer, add rice and water. Microwave on high for 8–10 min.
While rice is cooking, stir fry eggs, egg whites, and 3 Onion Dip Mix in a Wok.
Add kimchi and coleslaw mix. Stir-fry for 2–3 min.
Add rice, sesame oil, and soy sauce; stir-fry for an additional 2–3 min.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

products.name: Round Steamer
summary: A must-have tool for every kitchen! Our game-changing silicone Round Steamer cooks food faster and more evenly in the microwave. Bring a whole, juicy Roast Chicken to the table in 20 minutes, perfectly cook fluffy grains, baked potatoes, and tender veggies, or meal prep soups and chowders for easy weeknight meals. The possibilities are endless!

products.name: Wok & Glass Lid
summary: Classic Wok with curvy side & generous surface area for stir-frying.
